analysis.Summary: This Vue component renders the main product image (including a 360° view if available), a list of thumbnails, and a popup photo viewer for enlarged images.
analysis.Purpose: Provide an interactive image gallery for products, supporting both standard images and 360° rotational views, within the product details UI.

Components.name: Image360
Components.responsibility: Displays a 360-degree rotational view of the product using a sequence of images.

Components.name: PlaceholderImage
Components.responsibility: Renders a placeholder graphic when no image is available.

Components.name: Popup
Components.responsibility: Wraps its slot content in a modal overlay and emits a close event.

Components.name: PhotoViewer
Components.responsibility: Displays a full-screen view of the currently selected image.

Functions.name: openPopup
Functions.description: If a valid image URL is passed, stores it in selectedImage and opens the popup.

Functions.name: closePopup
Functions.description: Closes the photo viewer popup by setting isPopupVisible to false.

analysis.Usage: Typically imported into a product details page or another parent component to display a product’s images. For example: import ProductImages from 'modules/products/components/blocks/ProductImages.vue'.
Notes: Uses a global FILE_SERVER_URL constant to build full image source URLs.
Applies lazy loading to thumbnails and main images for performance.
Scoped CSS ensures the .thumbnail rules only affect this component.
Handles both a single main image and multiple thumbnails conditionally.
